list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'll take a taxi from the air terminal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ đi taxi từ bến cảng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an aircraft) move slowly along the ground before takeoff or after landing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the plane taxis up to a waiting limousine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Taxi máy bay lên đến một chiếc limousine đang chờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take a taxi as a means of transport.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I would taxi home and sleep till eight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ taxi về nhà và ngủ cho đến tám
